detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract OneNightStand (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OneNightStand.sol#102-224) has payable functions:
	 - OneNightStand.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OneNightStand.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
